|brand = D-Link |model = DSL-2740B |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = F1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router,dsl modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = KA2SL2740BF1 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM63281; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = BMIPS4350 |cpu1spd = 320 <!-- 320 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6406EN1-12G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Mira;P3R12E4JFF-G8E; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |dsl_ports = |voip_ports = |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = ADSL2+ |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Delta Networks |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/27/2011 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9287; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "2976380401" and "A610A234006R_R6" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
This device appears to use [[Broadcom]] BCM63281.
Additional models of.. *DSL-2750B (Annex A, USB, 'dying gasp' feature) *DSL-2740B (Annex A, no USB, without 'dying gasp') *DSL-2740U (Annex A, no USB, without 'dying gasp') *DSL-2741B (Annex B, USB, 'dying gasp' feature) *DSL-2741U (Annex B, USB, 'dying gasp' feature)
"A610A234006R_R6" and "2976380401" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
==See also== *[[D-Link DSL-2750U rev C1]] :[[Broadcom]] BCM63281/BCM43225 *[[D-Link DSL-2750B rev T1]] :[[Broadcom]] BCM63281/BCM43225 *[[D-Link DSL-2750B rev B1]] (AW4339U) :[[Broadcom]] BCM63281/[[Atheros]] AR9287 *[[D-Link DSL-2740B rev F1]] :[[Broadcom]] BCM63281/[[Atheros]] AR9287
*[[D-Link DSL-2740R rev A1]] • [[TrendChip]]/[[Ralink]] *[[D-Link DSL-2740R rev B1]] • [[TrendChip]]/[[Ralink]] *[[D-Link DSL-2740B rev C2]] • [https://oldwiki.archive.openwrt.org/toh/d-link/dsl-2740b OpenWrt] :[[Broadcom]] BCM6358/BCM4321, 4MB/32MB :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX29LV320CTTC-70G :[[D-Link DSL-2741B rev C2]] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-link/d-link_dsl-2740b1b_c2 OpenWrt] *[[D-Link DSL-2740B rev C3]] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-link/d-link_dsl-2740b1b_c3 OpenWrt] :[[Broadcom]] BCM6358/BCM4321, 4MB/32MB *[[D-Link DSL-2740B rev C4]] • [http://www.natthapol89.com/2014/04/d-link-dsl-2740b-c4.html Teardown] :[[Broadcom]] BCM6358SR/BCM4321/RTL8306G :Flash: Macronix MX29LV640ETTI-70G (8MB) :RAM: Mira P3S56D40ETP (32MB) *[[D-Link DSL-2740B rev D1]] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-link/d-link_dsl-2750b_d1 OpenWrt] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM6318 (333MHz) ADSL2+ :Flash/RAM: 8MB/64MB, SW: 4x FE :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43217 *[[D-Link DSL-2740B rev E1]] • [https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/d-link/d-link_dsl-2740b_e1 OpenWrt] • [https://www.dlink-forum.info/index.php?topic=213.0 FW] :[[Broadcom]] BCM6358/BCM4321, 16MB/32MB *[[D-Link DSL-2740B rev R1]] • [https://www.dlink-forum.it/index.php?topic=1150.420 Forum]
